description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Magicians and Looters is an action/exploration 2D platformer. You could also call it a Metroidvania, if that's your thing.  Embark on a rescue mission through castles, forests, caverns, even an underground city. There's a talking cat, too.
description.short: Magicians and Looters is an action/exploration 2D platformer. You could also call it a Metroidvania, if that's your thing.  Embark on a rescue mission through castles, forests, caverns, even an underground city. There's a talking cat, too.
